EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_The Insiders Guide to Mobile Apps_Q115.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Webinar: Insider’s Guide to Mobile Apps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/agile/insiders-guide-to-mobile-apps-webinar?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=Global_Webinar_5> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Building mobile apps that can transform business is on everyone's 2015 to-do list, but how do you avoid common pitfalls?
In this webinar <http://www.pivotal.io/agile/insiders-guide-to-mobile-apps-webinar?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=Global_Webinar_5>, Pivotal’s Dormain Drewitz asks Farhan Thawar, VP of Engineering at Pivotal Labs, what they have learned in their decade-long experience building great apps for all industries.
Learn:
- Common mistakes in mobile app development - Best practices of (and from) leading mobile app developers - About the secret weapons: PaaS and Agile development practices can support mobile app development
JOIN US >> <http://www.pivotal.io/agile/insiders-guide-to-mobile-apps-webinar?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=Global_Webinar_5> THE INSIDER'S GUIDE TO MOBILE APPS WEDNESDAY JANUARY 7, 2015 10AM PST REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/agile/insiders-guide-to-mobile-apps-webinar?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=Global_Webinar_5>
